item.title: Accor's third hotel in Bengaluru is #bangalorelovin
item.description: Accor’s Ibis brand has opened its third hotel in Bengaluru, India, accompanied by a “#bangalorelovin” campaign designed to highlight the city’s appeal. Source: Accor. JB Singh, President & CEO of InterGlobe Hotels, emphasized Bengaluru’s cosmopolitan nature, stating that the new Ibis hotel caters to both business and leisure travelers seeking affordable luxury. He expressed enthusiasm for providing memorable guest experiences. Firoz Jangaria, General Manager of Ibis Bengaluru City Centre, highlighted the hotel’s strategic location and commitment to quality accommodations at economical prices.
